title.text: Windows Internet Explorer 9 for Windows Server 2008 for x64-based systems

description.text:
Windows Internet Explorer 9 delivers web sites and applications that look and perform like native PC applications through the power of Windows.

          Fast: Internet Explorer 9 is all-around fast.  Designed to take full advantage of your PCâ€™s hardware through Windows, Internet Explorer 9 delivers graphically rich and immersive experiences that are as fast and responsive as native applications installed on your PC.

          Clean: Internet Explorer puts the focus on the Web sites you love with a clean look and increased viewing area that makes your Web sites shine.  Intuitive and seamless integration with Windows Server 2008 provides one-click access to Web applications pinned directly to your Taskbar.

          Trusted: Internet Explorer is the trusted way to the Web because it has a robust set of built-in security, privacy and reliability technologies that keep you safer and your browsing experience uninterrupted.

          Interoperable: Support for HTML5 and modern Web standards architected to take advantage of the GPU means that the same mark-up not only works across the Web, but runs faster and delivers a richer experience through Windows and  Internet Explorer 9.
